title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide an incentive to encourage the replacement of inefficient, outdated freight railcars with greener, more fuel efficient vehicles.
content: Green Railcar Enhancement Act of 2010 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow, through 2011, a new business-related tax credit for 25 of the cost of acquiring or rebuilding freight railcars which achieve an increase in capacity or fuel efficiency of at least 8.
